text: ( maniacal laughter )

My money-making lasers are
going to make me even richer!

Shadow Moth:
Bring me Ladybug

and Cat Noir's Miraculous,
Mooloch.

Depends how much these
trinkets are worth.
How much is your power,
which I can take back from you
in an instant worth to you?

A guy can't even strike
a bargain these days.

- ( thud )
- ( gasps )

( laughing )
You'll never get your hands

- on my lucky coin!
- We have to get to Mooloch
if we're going to defeat him.
Pegasus, use your power now.
Voyage!

I can't teleport. The safe is
so filled up with coins,

- there's no room.
- It'd be simpler just to

- Cataclysm the whole safe.
- I know.

I already left I don't know
how many messages for Cat Noir.
( Mooloch laughing )
I'm getting so rich!

Adrien, your father
is counting on you.
Next question.

Adrien's voice:
You can purr your message
after the the meow. Meow!
Lucky charm!

- ( siren wailing )
- Look out!
Hmm. Got it.

- Gear up, guys.
- Multitude!

- Venom!
- Mooloch: Nice try.

- Shield her!
- Mooloch: Blasted super nerds!

- Un-shield.
- ( Mooloch laughs )

Viperion, try every
possible combination.

- ( Mooloch chuckles )
- Second chance.

Viperion, try every
possible combination.
Second chance.

Jackpot.
And it only took me 100 tries.
Mooloch: Oh, no!
No!

Woman:
About your new commercial...
All: Pound it!
I'll start over 100 times
if I have to, Ladybug.
All I have to do is win once.

- Scales, rest.
- Thanks, Luka.

- This really takes the cake.
- Grand Master Su-Han?

Nine! You used nine Miraculous
to defeat a single villain

when Cat Noir could've
just used his Cataclysm!

I had to.
Cat Noir was missing.

What do you mean missing?
You can't just let the holder

of one of the most
powerful Miraculous
go about as he pleases!

What if he started
making his own decisions
or acted out like Shadow Moth?

Cat Noir?
Act like Shadow Moth?

Wow. Aren't you blowing this out
of proportion just a little?

Not at all.
In fact, you should find out
who Cat Noir really is,

so you can have better
control over him.

What? No way. We can't know
our true identities.
It would be too dangerous

if Shadow Moth
got ahold of one of us.

I don't care!
Deal with this problem quickly,

otherwise
I'll take back his Miraculous

as soon
as he shows a whisker,

and I'll choose
the new Cat Noir myself.

Okay, okay. All right.
What if you knew who he was?

- Would that work?
- I-- I suppose so.

But I'm warning you,
if you don't succeed--

I get it.
Cat Noir will be replaced.

Are you really going
to do as he asks?

Do I really have
a choice in the matter?

I can't fight
the celestial guardian,

and I don't want to take
the risk of losing our Cat Noir.
I'm going to need both of you.

I hope Ladybug didn't need me.
Plagg, claws out.
( chiming )

Fourteen messages.
She must be furious.

- ( line ringing )
- Ladybug: Finally.

I know what you're about
to say, Ladybug.

Never mind. We got through it,
that's all that matters.
But we do need to talk.

Meet me at the top
of the Eiffel Tower.

I get a feeling I'll have
my whiskers yanked.
